code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MyEvents=()=>{const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchMyEvents();},[]);const fetchMyEvents=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const res=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/events/my-events",{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setEvents(res.data);}catch(err){console.error("Error fetching my events:",err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading your registered events..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My Registered Events"}),events.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You have not registered for any events yet."}):events.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{border:"1px solid #ccc",padding:"15px",marginBottom:"15px",borderRadius:"8px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Date:"})," ",item.event_date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Venue:"})," ",item.venue]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Payment Status:"})," ",item.payment_status]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Payment Method:"})," ",item.payment_method||"N/A"]})]},item.registration_id))]});};export default MyEvents;
